china mahajana wimukthi hamudawe gowi kamkaru adhyapana wyapruthiya yatathe 1975 sita 1979 dakwa beyijin aganuwara chinhuaa wishwawidyalaye rasayanika injineru patamalawa hadarimata shi chin pin thora ganna ladi.1969 sita 1975 dakwa krushi kamkaruwaku washayen gowiyan samanga wada kala me tharunaya kopamana aadarayata lak wuwada yath, chinhuaa sarasawiya bala yannata pitath weddi gowin samuhayak kilo mir 30 ka pa gamanin ohu samanga dumriya sthanaya dakwa gaman kala bawa wartha gathawi atha.siragathawa siti ohuge piya me wana wita nidahasa laba sitiyeya.

eyata pasu 2011 sha්ri lankawe pawathi pa්rathama dakunu aasiyanu werala ka්rida uleledi sha්ri lanka werala wolibol pirimi kandayame mahesh perera saha wasantha rathnapala yana ka්ridakayanda kantha kandayame githika gunawardhana saha thakshila niranjali yana ka්ridikawan da sha්ri lankawata ran padakkam dinadi gaurawayak himikara dimata samath wiya. 2006 doha katar hidi pawathi aasiyanu ka්rida uleledi sha්ri lankawa pa්rathama warata werala wolibol ka්ridawen aasiyanu ka්rida ulelak niyojanaya kala athara, eyata pasu 2010 chinaya, 2014 dakunu koriyawe pawathi aasiyanu ka්rida ulelayanhidi sha්ri lanka werala wolibol kandayam sahabhagi wuha. 2009 singappuruwe pawathi pa්rathama aasiyanu yowun ka්rida ulela saha 2014 chinaye pawathi
